column4: Sept. 1 – Within the first eight months of 2018
column6: over 1.7 million international tourists purchased Angkor tickets
column7: an increase of 8.49% compared to the same period in 2017
column8: generating over $78 million revenue according to Angkor Enterprise’s report released on 1 September 2018.------In 2017
column9: Cambodia earned nearly $108 million from over 2.5 million tourists
column10: and that $4 million donated to the Kantha Bopha Children’s Hospital.------
